TopicTitle: Jool Moons Flag Pack! Works with all versions that have flags.

Articles.Content:
I took some real world flags (Credit to the International Flags Pack for the original resizing) and recolored/edited them to be for Jool's Moons. Use them on your manned missions to the moons of Jool!

DOWNLOAD

https://drive.google.com/file/d/0BwXVzhnuZJP8R1JxcGw0WmlEUDQ/edit?usp=sharing

FLAGS

Vall

I took the flag of Qatar, and used the dot from the flag of Japan to make the colorswapped "Circle"

Laythe

I took the flag of South Korea, removing the lines and adding the Dark Green background because Laythe is the closest moon to Jool.

Pol

I took the basic base for the cross on some of the European flags (Source: Swedish Flag) and colored it, adding a little "Outline." Made in the Moon's colors, like the others.

Bop

This one was made from the swiss flag and links to my own United Federation of Jool's universe. The brown is the rocky terrain, the green represents Jool, and the VERY Thin red stripes on the sides represent the blood of the Krakens, Bop being the ancient burial grounds of the space krakens.

Tylo

This one is also slightly symbolic. It's made from the Saint Lucia flag. The Green represents Jool, the dark and light grey represent the craters, and the black is space.
It looks really nice! But i'll stick to my own flags, just feels better.
